mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (ADDRESS, ID, PASSWORD, GENDER, EMAIL, NAME, BIRTH, ISSALESMANAGER , PROFILE_PICTURE) VALUES (#{address}, #{id}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{isSalesManager} , #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET NAME = #{name}, ADDRESS = #{address}, PROFILE_PICTURE = #{profilePicture, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id}
